name: Chrono Loom Band
summary: A loop of woven time fiber that tightens around stray impulses.
positive: Depresses the sanity drain for as long as the band holds.
negative: Snaps back with stored energy, heating the hourglass.
neutral: It faintly ticks in triple time while it works.

effects.message: The band cinches distractions into a disciplined rhythm.
When it releases, a surge ripples through the sand.
Chrono Loom Band and Brass Loom Spool braid reinforcements across the chamber.
Interlaced threads relieve the flux burden.
Woven cords brace you against the next backlash.
